description: Color Outside the Lines Design + Function Step away from the ordinary with an iPod case that blends a sense of sharp design and lifestyle elements with effective device protection. The polycarbonate layered structure makes it easy to grip and the metallic graphics will enhance your overall sense of style. Protection that Fits: The thin, yet durable material is a stylish way to keep your iPod's surface free of scratches and scuffs, without adding extra bulk.
title: Belkin Meta 018 Case for Apple iPod Touch 4th Generation (Blacktop)
